beer.name: Dead Guy Ale
beer.description: In the style of a German Maibock, using our proprietary Pacman ale yeast. Deep honey in color with a malty aroma and a rich hearty flavor.
beer.grains: Northwest Harrington, Klages, Maier Munich and Carastan.
Northwest Harrington, Klages, Maier Munich and Carastan.
beer.yeast: Rogue's Pacman Yeast & Free Range Coastal Water.
